zh-cn: 莱比锡卡尔·马克思大学

description.zh-cn: 位于德国萨克森州的公立研究型大学，创立于1409年，是欧洲最古老的大学之一，也是现今德国辖地内历史第二悠久而运作年期未曾中断的大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Leipzig, Saxony, Germany. Founded on December 2, 1409, it is one of Europe's oldest universities and the second-oldest university in Germany by consecutive years of existence.

nodes.id: 腓特烈一世 (萨克森选侯)

zh-cn: 腓特烈一世 (萨克森选侯)

description.zh-cn: 韦廷王朝的边伯侯爵及萨克森选帝侯，与弟弟威廉二世共同创建了莱比锡大学。
description.en: Margrave of Meissen and Elector of Saxony from the House of Wettin, who co-founded the University of Leipzig with his brother William II.

description.zh-cn: 韦廷王朝的边伯侯爵，与兄长腓特烈一世共同创建了莱比锡大学。
description.en: Margrave of Meissen from the House of Wettin, who co-founded the University of Leipzig with his brother Frederick I.

description.zh-cn: 位于布拉格的大学。1409年该校的分裂促使德国师生返回故乡，从而推动了莱比锡大学的建立。
description.en: A university in Prague. A division within the university in 1409 prompted German teachers and students to return to their homeland, leading to the establishment of the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会的最高领袖。历山五世作为教宗于1409年认可了莱比锡大学的成立。
description.en: The supreme pontiff of the Catholic Church. Pope Alexander V recognized the establishment of the University of Leipzig in 1409.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会教宗，于1409年9月9日正式认可莱比锡大学的成立。
description.en: Pope of the Catholic Church who officially recognized the establishment of the University of Leipzig on September 9, 1409.

description.zh-cn: 一所兽医学校，于1923年从德累斯顿迁至莱比锡，并成为莱比锡大学的兽医系。
description.en: A veterinary school that moved from Dresden to Leipzig in 1923 to become the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突，期间莱比锡大学的建筑和藏书因空袭而遭到严重破坏。
description.en: A global military conflict during which the University of Leipzig's buildings and book collections were severely damaged by air raids.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年期间由阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治的德国。该政权在二战期间允许莱比锡大学继续授课。
description.en: Germany under the rule of Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party from 1933 to 1945. The regime permitted the University of Leipzig to continue teaching during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、经济学家、历史学家、政治理论家、社会学家、共产主义者、革命家。莱比锡大学曾在1953年至1991年间以他的名字命名。
description.en: A German philosopher, economist, historian, political theorist, sociologist, communist, and revolutionary. The University of Leipzig was named after him from 1953 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的综合性研究型大学，与莱比锡大学合作共建了莱比锡大学孔子学院。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Beijing, China, which collaborated with the University of Leipzig to establish the Confucius Institute at the University of Leipzig.

nodes.id: 国家汉语国际推广领导小组办公室

zh-cn: 国家汉语国际推广领导小组办公室
en: Office of Chinese Language Council International

description.zh-cn: 中国教育部下属机构，负责在全球范围内推广汉语和中国文化。该机构与莱比锡大学签署协议，合作建设莱比锡大学孔子学院。
description.en: An institution under the Ministry of Education of China, responsible for promoting the Chinese language and culture worldwide. It signed an agreement with the University of Leipzig to co-establish the Confucius Institute at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 由莱比锡大学与中国人民大学合作建设的文化机构，旨在向德国东部地区介绍中国、汉语和中国文化。
description.en: A cultural institution established in collaboration between the University of Leipzig and Renmin University of China, aiming to introduce China, the Chinese language, and Chinese culture to eastern Germany.

description.zh-cn: 德国心理学家，实验心理学的创始人。1879年，他在担任莱比锡大学哲学教授时建立了世界上第一个心理学实验室。
description.en: A German psychologist and the founder of experimental psychology. In 1879, while a professor of philosophy at the University of Leipzig, he established the world's first psychology laboratory.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治家，德国首位女总理。曾于莱比锡大学学习物理学。
description.en: A German politician and the first female Chancellor of Germany. She studied physics at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 德国诗人、剧作家、小说家、思想家，曾于莱比锡大学学习法学和诗歌学。
description.en: A German poet, playwright, novelist, and thinker who studied law and poetics at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、文化评论家、作曲家、诗人，曾于莱比锡大学学习古典语言学。
description.en: A German philosopher, cultural critic, composer, and poet who studied classical philology at the University of Leipzig.

nodes.id: 戈特弗里德·威廉·莱布尼茨

zh-cn: 戈特弗里德·威廉·莱布尼茨

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家和数学家，曾于莱比锡大学学习哲学。
description.en: A German philosopher and mathematician who studied philosophy at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 德国物理学家，1932年诺贝尔物理学奖获得者，曾任莱比锡大学理论物理学教授。
description.en: A German physicist and Nobel laureate in Physics in 1932, who served as a professor of theoretical physics at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，中华民国首任教育总长，曾任北京大学校长。曾于莱比锡大学学习哲学、心理学和艺术史。
description.en: A Chinese educator, the first Minister of Education of the Republic of China, and former president of Peking University. He studied philosophy, psychology, and art history at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 中国思想家、学者，曾于莱比锡大学学习土木工程。
description.en: A Chinese thinker and scholar who studied civil engineering at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，曾在莱比锡大学攻读语言学并获得博士学位。
description.en: A Chinese writer who studied linguistics and obtained a doctorate from the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 中国理论物理学家、流体力学家，曾在莱比锡大学海森堡教授的指导下工作。
description.en: A Chinese theoretical physicist and fluid dynamicist who worked under the guidance of Professor Heisenberg at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委。曾在莱比锡大学学习德语。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee. He studied German at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交家，曾任中国驻德意志联邦共和国大使。曾在莱比锡大学学习德语。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat who served as the Chinese Ambassador to the Federal Republic of Germany. He studied German at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 华裔数学家，代数几何领域代表人物之一，于1936年获得莱比锡大学数学博士学位。
description.en: A Chinese-American mathematician, a key figure in algebraic geometry, who received his PhD in mathematics from the University of Leipzig in 1936.

nodes.id: 斯凡特·奥古斯特·阿伦尼乌斯

zh-cn: 斯凡特·奥古斯特·阿伦尼乌斯

description.zh-cn: 瑞典化学家，1903年诺贝尔化学奖获得者，曾在莱比锡大学担任威廉·奥斯特瓦尔德的助教。
description.en: A Swedish chemist and Nobel laureate in Chemistry in 1903, who served as an assistant to Wilhelm Ostwald at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 德国化学家，1909年诺贝尔化学奖获得者，曾任莱比锡大学物理化学教授。
description.en: A German chemist and Nobel laureate in Chemistry in 1909, who served as a professor of physical chemistry at the University of Leipzig.

relationships.source: 腓特烈一世 (萨克森选侯)

description.zh-cn: 腓特烈一世和他的弟弟威廉二世于1409年创建了莱比锡大学。
description.en: Frederick I and his brother William II founded the University of Leipzig in 1409.

description.zh-cn: 威廉二世和他的兄长腓特烈一世于1409年创建了莱比锡大学。
description.en: William II and his brother Frederick I founded the University of Leipzig in 1409.

description.zh-cn: 1409年查理大学发生分裂，许多在布拉格的德国师生因此返回故乡，促成了莱比锡大学的建立。
description.en: A division at Charles University in 1409 caused many German teachers and students in Prague to return to their homeland, which led to the founding of the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 莱比锡大学的成立获得了时任教宗历山五世的认可。
description.en: The establishment of the University of Leipzig was recognized by the then-Pope Alexander V.

description.zh-cn: 历山五世是天主教会的教宗。
description.en: Alexander V was the Pope of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 1923年，萨克森皇家兽医学校从德累斯顿搬到莱比锡，成为莱比锡大学兽医系。
description.en: In 1923, the Royal Saxon Veterinary School moved from Dresden to Leipzig and became the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine of the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战爆发后，莱比锡大学是被德意志第三帝国允许继续授课的四所大学之一。
description.en: After the outbreak of World War II, the University of Leipzig was one of four universities permitted by the Third Reich to continue teaching.

description.zh-cn: 二战结束时，莱比锡大学60%的建筑和70%的藏书在空袭中化为灰烬。
description.en: By the end of World War II, 60% of the University of Leipzig's buildings and 70% of its book collection had been destroyed in air raids.

description.zh-cn: 在1953年至1991年间，莱比锡大学曾以卡尔·马克思的名字命名为“莱比锡卡尔·马克思大学”。
description.en: Between 1953 and 1991, the University of Leipzig was named 'Karl Marx University, Leipzig' after Karl Marx.

relationships.source: 国家汉语国际推广领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 国家汉语国际推广领导小组办公室与莱比锡大学签署协议，合作建设莱比锡大学孔子学院。
description.en: The Office of Chinese Language Council International signed an agreement with the University of Leipzig to jointly establish the Confucius Institute at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 莱比锡大学与中国人民大学合作建设了莱比锡大学孔子学院。
description.en: The University of Leipzig and Renmin University of China collaborated to establish the Confucius Institute at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民大学与莱比锡大学合作建设了莱比锡大学孔子学院。
description.en: Renmin University of China and the University of Leipzig collaborated to establish the Confucius Institute at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 威廉·冯特自1875年起任莱比锡大学哲学教授，并于1879年在该校建立了全世界第一个心理学研究所。
description.en: Wilhelm Wundt served as a professor of philosophy at the University of Leipzig from 1875 and established the world's first psychology laboratory at the university in 1879.

description.zh-cn: 1973年至1978年就读物理学专业。
description.en: Studied physics from 1973 to 1978.

description.zh-cn: 1765年至1768年就读法学和诗歌学专业。
description.en: Studied law and poetics from 1765 to 1768.

description.zh-cn: 1865年至1869年就读古典语言学专业。
description.en: Studied classical philology from 1865 to 1869.

relationships.source: 戈特弗里德·威廉·莱布尼茨

description.zh-cn: 1661年至1663年就读哲学专业。
description.en: Studied philosophy from 1661 to 1663.

description.zh-cn: 1927年至1942年任理论物理学教授。
description.en: Served as a professor of theoretical physics from 1927 to 1942.

description.zh-cn: 1908年至1911年就读哲学、心理学和艺术史专业。
description.en: Studied philosophy, psychology, and art history from 1908 to 1911.

description.zh-cn: 1877年就读土木工程专业。
description.en: Studied civil engineering in 1877.

description.zh-cn: 1921年至1922年就读语言学，获博士学位。
description.en: Studied linguistics from 1921 to 1922 and received a doctorate.

description.zh-cn: 1928年秋赴德，在莱比锡大学海森堡教授领导下工作。
description.en: Went to Germany in the autumn of 1928 to work under the leadership of Professor Heisenberg at the University of Leipzig.

description.zh-cn: 周培源在莱比锡大学期间，在海森堡教授的领导下工作。
description.en: During his time at the University of Leipzig, Zhou Peiyuan worked under the leadership of Professor Heisenberg.

description.zh-cn: 1954年至1955年就读德语。
description.en: Studied German from 1954 to 1955.

description.zh-cn: 1953年至1956年就读德语。
description.en: Studied German from 1953 to 1956.

description.zh-cn: 1936年获莱比锡大学数学博士学位。
description.en: Received a PhD in Mathematics from the University of Leipzig in 1936.

relationships.source: 斯凡特·奥古斯特·阿伦尼乌斯

description.zh-cn: 1888年任威廉·奥斯特瓦尔德助教。
description.en: Served as an assistant to Wilhelm Ostwald in 1888.

relationships.source: 斯凡特·奥古斯特·阿伦尼乌斯

description.zh-cn: 1888年任威廉·奥斯特瓦尔德助教。
description.en: Served as an assistant to Wilhelm Ostwald in 1888.

description.zh-cn: 1887年至1906年任物理化学教授。
description.en: Served as a professor of physical chemistry from 1887 to 1906.
